ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: A library for creating time based charts, like Gantt or timelines. Possible outputs include 'ggplot2' diagrams, 'plotly.js' graphs, 'Highcharts.js' widgets and data.frames. Results can be used in the 'RStudio' viewer pane, in 'RMarkdown' documents or in Shiny apps. In the interactive outputs created by vistime() and hc_vistime(), you can interact with the plot using mouse hover or zoom.

A library for creating time based charts, like Gantt or timelines. Possible outputs include 'ggplot2' diagrams, 'plotly.js' graphs, 'Highcharts.js' widgets and data.frames. Results can be used in the 'RStudio' viewer pane, in 'RMarkdown' documents or in Shiny apps. In the interactive outputs created by vistime() and hc_vistime(), you can interact with the plot using mouse hover or zoom.

name: r-vistime
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.2.4" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-vistime
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/vistime_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/vistime/vistime_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: d13b6f5a6fd2b376d4956cc3a0bf892e2912a5dd2c0caa88631f50efd115d592

build:
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-rcolorbrewer >=0.2.2
    - r-assertthat >=0.1
    - r-ggplot2 >=3.4.0
    - r-ggrepel >=0.7.0
    - r-plotly >=4.0.0
    - r-rlang
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-rcolorbrewer >=0.2.2
    - r-assertthat >=0.1
    - r-ggplot2 >=3.4.0
    - r-ggrepel >=0.7.0
    - r-plotly >=4.0.0
    - r-rlang

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('vistime')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('vistime')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://shosaco.github.io/vistime/
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: A library for creating time based charts, like Gantt or timelines. Possible outputs include 'ggplot2' diagrams, 'plotly.js' graphs, 'Highcharts.js' widgets and data.frames. Results can be used in the 'RStudio' viewer pane, in 'RMarkdown' documents or in Shiny apps. In the interactive outputs created by vistime()
    and hc_vistime(), you can interact with the plot using mouse hover or zoom.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - thewchan

# The original CRAN metadata for this package was:

# Title: Pretty Timelines in R

# Description: A library for creating time based charts, like Gantt or timelines. Possible outputs include 'ggplot2' diagrams, 'plotly.js' graphs, 'Highcharts.js' widgets and data.frames. Results can be used in the 'RStudio' viewer pane, in 'RMarkdown' documents or in Shiny apps. In the interactive outputs created by vistime() and hc_vistime(), you can interact with the plot using mouse hover or zoom.
# License: GPL-3 | file LICENSE
# URL: https://shosaco.github.io/vistime/
# BugReports: https://github.com/shosaco/vistime/issues
